Alaa Shoier bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, a mụrụ na Cairo, Egypt na 15 Ọktoba 1992, a maara maka ọrụ ya na Nesr El Saeed (Eagle of Upper Egypt) na Khat Sakhen (Hotline) usoro wepụtara n'afọ 2018
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ dị ka Dream na 9th Street, nke a ka ga-egosi.
Alaa Shoier gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mass Media and Communication na American College of Greece na masters ya na Leadership and Innovation in Contemporary Media na American University na Dubai.
Alaa Shoier malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 2018 site na ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn Egypt. Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ:
